clinical_study.brief_title: Pathway to Detection & Differentiation of Delirium & Dementia in the Emergency Department
clinical_study.official_title: Pathway to Detection & Differentiation of Delirium & Dementia in the Emergency Department

brief_summary.textblock: This is an observational study of the pragmatic implementation of an ED screening, outpatient referral, and care coordination process for older ED patients who may have UCID.

detailed_description.textblock: Embedded pragmatic, implementation pilot that incorporates training, ED assessment for delirium and dementia risk, referral of ED patients with undiagnosed cognitive impairment and dementia for primary care feedback and care recommendations. This pilot would gather observational data evaluating the feasibility of incorporating cognitive impairment screens into routine ED delirium assessments, and developing optimal work flow for identifying and referring ED patients with suspected (undiagnosed) dementia for confirmatory evaluation and care coordination.

primary_outcome.measure: ED screening rates of delirium vs. suspected dementia
primary_outcome.description: Number of patients 75+ screened / total number of ED visit by patients 75+

primary_outcome.measure: Detection rates of delirium vs. suspected dementia
primary_outcome.description: daily number of patients discharged from ED with positive suspected dementia screen / number of patients 75+ screened.

primary_outcome.measure: Rates of outpatient assessment referral of patients with suspected dementia
primary_outcome.description: number of patients with appointment to ADC or geriatrics outpatient clinic / number of patients given information sheet or referred to outpatient clinic

primary_outcome.measure: Rates of confirmed dementia or mild cognitive impairment
primary_outcome.description: number of patients positive for dementia or MCI / number of patients from ED seen at clinic with completion of UDS assessment

primary_outcome.measure: Rates of connection with primary care
primary_outcome.description: number of patients with PCP follow-up about brain health plan / number of patients with outpatient confirmation of Dementia or MCI

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults age 65 or older
- Discharged from the adult ED at YNHH or the ED at NMH
Exclusion Criteria:
- Documented or known history of dementia
- Alcohol/substance intoxication while in the ED
- Non-English or Non-Spanish speaking
